Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Kam Leng Hotel by JL Asia in Singapore (Little India), you'll be minutes from City Square Mall and close to Haji Lane. This hotel is within close proximity of Mustafa Centre and Sri Veeramakaliamman Temple.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 70 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access and dry cleaning/laundry services.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

City Square Mall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Mustafa Centre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Sri Veeramakaliamman Temple - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Malay Heritage Centre - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Sultan Mosque - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Sim Lim Square - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Haji Lane - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Bugis Street Shopping District - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Bugis Junction Shopping Center - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Kwan Im Thong Hood Cho - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Kwan Im Thong Hood Cho Temple - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Singapore National Stadium - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
National Library Board Singapore - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
United Square Mall - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Tan Tock Seng Hospital - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for Kam Leng Hotel by JL Asia is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
